summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Project P Innovations AI consultancy website. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% pass rate) and frontend functionality fully operational including job listings, application submissions, admin dashboard, and authentication flows.

design_issues.issue: Minor text spacing issue in hero headline parsing but displays correctly visually

passed_tests: Backend: Admin login with correct/incorrect credentials
Backend: Application submission with file upload validation
Frontend: Homepage loads with correct hero text
Frontend: Careers page job listings and filtering
Frontend: Admin login and dashboard functionality
Frontend: Job creation/editing in admin panel
Frontend: Applications viewing in admin dashboard
Integration: File upload from UI to backend storage
